resources.string: Upload a file and share the link

The main purpose of this app is to upload Pictures at 666kb.com and then share the link. If launched directly, a list of all pictures uploaded is shown. To upload a picture share it via the gallery, the camera or any other app which provides an image. After the image has been uploaded to 666kb.com a link to the image is shown. This link can be copied to the clipboad or shared using any app capable of sharing text like email or SMS.

Tap on an entry to copy the URL. Press long for more options.

The developer of this app is not associated with the 666kb.com website.

This app and its source code is released under the GPLv3. The source code is available here: https://github.com/qorron/666up
The name 666kb.com could not be resolved. Is the network okay?
There was a problem while uploading the image. 666kb.com may be down or a firewall may be blocking this app.
The requested file could not be found.
The reply 666kb sent did not contain an image URL. There may be something wrong with the image (666kb supports only png, jpeg and gif) or the site has been changed.\n\nSend an error report?
The app was called in a way it could not understand.
Something went wrong. Please, just try again and if the error persists you could help me fix it by sending me an error report.\n\nSend an error report now?

Welcome!

There are no uploads stored in the database yet.

To upload and share a picture press the menu button and select "Camera" to take a new photo or "Gallery" to pick a picture from your gallery.

After that, the image is uploaded to 666kb.com and you can share it as a link.

Useful for texting or Google Talk
What to do if an entry is tapped
